title: Need help
body: Whenever I load into game my screen goes into a 3d ish movie type look. On the bottom left it say render rate low yet I haven't changed anything to my computer

replies.body: It sounds like you may have a stereoscopic 3D feature accidentally enabled. You should be able to find an option to disable this in your Graphic Driver's control panel. If you aren't sure how to get there, just let me know what video card you have so I can help out. ^.^
